name: Extreme Hand and Foot
description:
Hand and foot is and addictive game similar to Canasta.
You are dealt 2 hands (a hand and a foot) and you must play through both!

Play for points, for play to catch out for opponent, its up to you.

Play with your Friends online, or by yourself against the computer opponent.

Extreme Hand and Foot Features :
- Basic and Detailed Game Rules
- Single Player against a challenging computer opponent.
- Online Turn Based Multiplayer.
- Local multiplayer with no internet connection required.
- Extreme game mode, for the more adventurous, with 2 feet and higher score targets!
- Elegant simplistic design, with full detailed playing cards.
- Card sounds and Animations for the authentic card game experience.
- Progress Saved, keep coming back to your game.
- Customise the rules, play your way.
